tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_segmentation (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    city VARCHAR(50)
)
CREATE TABLE customers ( customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), city VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE segments ( segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, segment_name VARCHAR(50), segment_description VARCHAR(255) );

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE segments (
    segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_segments (
    customer_id INT,
    segment_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id, segment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE demographics (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    income DECIMAL(10,2),
    marital_status VARCHAR(20),
    education VARCHAR(50),
    occupation VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE campaign_history (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    segment_id INT,
    date DATE,
    result VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   customer_name VARCHAR(100),
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   location VARCHAR(100),
   email VARCHAR(100),
   phone_number VARCHAR(15));

CREATE TABLE purchases (purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
   product_name VARCHAR(100),
   purchase_date DATE,
   purchase_amount DECIMAL(10,2));

CREATE TABLE demographics (customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
   income DECIMAL(10,2),
   education_level VARCHAR(50),
   marital_status VARCHAR(20));

CREATE TABLE segments (segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   segment_name VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE customer_segments (customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
   segment_id INT REFERENCES segments(segment_id));
